trans-unit.source: Represents a set of methods for creating instances of the <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient"></xref> provider's implementation of the data source classes.
Returns `true` if a <xref href="System.Data.Sql.SqlDataSourceEnumerator"></xref> can be created; otherwise `false` .

The <xref:System.Data.Common.DbProviderFactory> class provides the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbProviderFactory.CanCreateDataSourceEnumerator%2A> property so that inheritors can indicate whether they can provide a data source enumerator.
The <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlClientFactory> displays this property, but its value is always `true`.
`true` if a <xref href="System.Data.Sql.SqlDataSourceEnumerator"></xref> can be created; otherwise `false`.
Returns a strongly typed <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbCommand"></xref> instance.
A new strongly typed instance of <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbCommand"></xref>.
Returns a strongly typed <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder"></xref> instance.
A new strongly typed instance of <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder"></xref>.
Returns a strongly typed <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbConnection"></xref> instance.
A new strongly typed instance of <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbConnection"></xref>.
Returns a strongly typed <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder"></xref> instance.
A new strongly typed instance of <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder"></xref>.
Returns a strongly typed <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter"></xref> instance.
A new strongly typed instance of <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter"></xref>.
Returns a new <xref href="System.Data.Sql.SqlDataSourceEnumerator"></xref>.
A new data source enumerator.
Returns a strongly typed <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbParameter"></xref> instance.
A new strongly typed instance of <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbParameter"></xref>.
Returns a new <xref href="System.Security.CodeAccessPermission"></xref>.
A member of the <xref href="System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState"></xref> enumeration.
A strongly typed instance of <xref href="System.Security.CodeAccessPermission"></xref>.
Gets an instance of the <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlClientFactory"></xref>.
This can be used to retrieve strongly typed data objects.
For a description of this member, see <xref href="System.IServiceProvider.GetService(System.Type)"></xref>.
An object that specifies the type of service object to get.
A service object.
